comingle.runtime

Class CoMingleAndroidRuntime<RW extends comingle.rewrite.RewriteMachine>

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • comingle.comms.datapipe.DataPipeManager<comingle.facts.SerializedFact,java.lang.String>
        • comingle.runtime.CoMingleAndroidRuntime<RW>
  • Type Parameters:
    RW - the Rewrite Machine instance
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    comingle.comms.log.Logger, java.lang.Runnable

    public class CoMingleAndroidRuntime<RW extends comingle.rewrite.RewriteMachine>
extends comingle.comms.datapipe.DataPipeManager<comingle.facts.SerializedFact,java.lang.String>
implements comingle.comms.log.Logger
    The top-level runtime entity that combines a CoMingle Runtime and a Composite Directory, in the context of an Android activity.
    Author:
    Edmund S.L. Lam

                      java.lang.Class<RW> rwClass,
                      int adminPort,
                      int factPort,
                      java.lang.String defaultReqCode)
        Basic Constructor
        Parameters:
        activity - the activity that embeds this CoMingle runtime instance.
        rwClass - the class of the CoMingle runtime.
        adminPort - port number for administrative messages.
        factPort - port number for actual payload data.
        defaultReqCode - default request code of the application.

        Initialize standard directory setup dialog sequence
        Parameters:
        peer_list_row - Resource ID of row view for each node entry.
        peer_name - Resource ID of name field for a node.
        peer_loc - Resource ID of location field for a node.
        peer_ip - Resource ID of address field for a node.
        postDirChoiceListener - the directory chosen listener to invoke after user has chosen directory.
